sdwan.no_device_tips: You must add the device to one of the virtual networks in {cloud} to use this feature.
sdwan.device_tips: You have been added to the virtual network {network} . Please go to {cloud} to modify the settings.
sdwan.real_time_data_tips: Includes only the device's data through the Gateway; the data may deviate from the billing data.
sdwan.interface_tips: You can disable specific interfaces from joining this virtual network.
